name: Action Classes should have only one public method
description:
Classes that inherit from org.apache.struts.action.Action with more than one public method will be listed. Exception to this rule: 
- all classes that inherit from org.apache.struts.action.DispatchAction that is specifically designed to group related actions into a single class and have more than one public method to handle each operation.
- all Action class that are also Spring Beans: in this case, setter methods are excluded from the violations
output:
This report lists all Action Classes with more than one public method.
It provides the following information:
 - Action Class full name
 - public method number
rationale: Action Classes should have only 1 public method, this eases struts usage (one function for one action).
total: All action classes, except those inheriting from dispatchaction
